value:
The beach really is the best place to
spend a holiday, isn't it? I'd like to
invite Annie to join us next time.

Your sunburn hurts? Hmm, maybe
I can heal you with my staff...
Let's give it a try, shall we?

Do you like my swimsuit? I chose it
for the fine stitching details in the
ruffles. It's quite cute too.

I thought a sweeter tea would pair
well with the beach atmosphere, so
I prepared some for us to enjoy.

Thank you for inviting me. I'm glad I
decided to come along and enjoy the
beach with you.

I'm on vacation at the beach with
$Nf.$k$pWould you care to join us?

Wonderful! Well, should we get back
to enjoying the sunshine?

Swimming at the beach is a bit like
training, I suppose.

The sunlight is a little too strong...
Could we rest in the shade for a
bit?

For me? Hehe, it seems this is going
to be a wonderful summer.

My name is Mercedes. I'm not usually
one for exercise, but if you'd like to
go swimming, I'd accompany you.

Do you see the sunset on the
horizon? It's so lovely against
the sea.$k$pJust looking out at it lifts my spirits.
I must show gratitude to the goddess
for that. However...$k$pI'm not completely free of worry. I
would love to enjoy the beach in a
battle-free Askr one day.$k$pI will do everything I can to make that
peace a reality. Being here makes me
even more determined to do so.$k$pI hope that the next time the two of
us are here, watching the sunset over
the water, we'll feel truly at peace.$k$pLet's continue to work hard while we
pray for that day to come,
$Nu.
えーいっ
やるわよ～
きゃあっ
冷たいっ…
Ride the wave!
What fun!
Tuckered out already?
Sink or swim!
I may have gone overboard...
うふっ
Thank you so much for including me on this trip to the beach. I'm just so happy to be here!
Oh? *giggle* You're a sneaky one, aren't you?
I'm not usually one for exercise, but swimming sure is fun!
Oh my, it's really warming up. Should we find a nice, shady spot to relax?
Everyone else ran off to participate in a swimming competition. Ah, to be so young. *giggle*
I must remember to thank the goddess for this wonderful vacation in my nightly prayers.
I spotted some beautiful fish in the nearby shoal. Would you like to take a look with me?
I can feel the heat!
Oh, this way?
Let's enjoy it!
